issue.title: Dae file takes too much time to load

content.raw: Hi, I am using blender version 2.7. Can you please elaborate how do you "joined" all the nodes through blender. Because I am not able to apply textures in .dae file using blender plus how can i remove these blue small  blocks which are almost in air. I have attached my .dae file using blender as well as the screnshot of warehouse in gazebo. Thanks!
